problems.title: Check Composite Number
problems.description:
You are given a positive integer N. A composite number is a number greater than 1 that is not prime (it has at least one divisor other than 1 and itself).

Your task is to check whether N is composite or not.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print "YES" if N is composite, otherwise print "NO".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
4

Sample Output
YES

Sample Input
7

Sample Output
NO
hintsList: You can reuse the prime check: composite means n > 1 and not prime. Or directly check if it has any divisor d with 2 <= d <= sqrt(n).
